page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content:
The general impression of this block is one of intensive farming in a rolling rural landscape.
Slicing through the block North to South are the some of the major radial transport routes centering on{ {Shrewsbury. }The {A49 }cuts the eastern edge,as does the {Shrewsbury {-Crewe Railway }line. The A528, { {Shrewsbury-Wrexham }road cuts through the centre of the block.Connecting the major roads are numerous narrow minor lanes that twist and turn following the old field boundaries.
The farms in the block are very varied in size;,from the large estates of {ALBRIGHTON HALL,}(part open to public) to smallholdings of just a few acres.{Dairy farming }predominates but includes{arrable}and {forestry. .
